Source.Name: zelda-roth-se
Source.Summary: A remake of the original Zelda Return of the Hylian, a short and pleasant fangame from Vincent Jouillat
Source.Description: Zelda Return of the Hylian Solarus Edition is a remake of the original Zelda Return of the Hylian, a short and pleasant fangame from Vincent Jouillat. The original game was developed in C++ and was released in 2006. This new version was developed with the Solarus engine by Christopho, Mymy and Vincent Jouillat. While this is essentially the same game, a lot of details were improved thanks to the use of Solarus
